name: healthcare-ai-app
description: Full-stack Healthcare AI Web Application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run lint || true
scripts.lint:client: cd client && npm run lint || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules server/uploads client/dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
